subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Allen Iverson scored 2 points in his Turkish league debut for Besiktas Cola Turka in a 74-67 loss to the defending champion Fenerbahce Ulker in Ankara.
snippet: Allen Iverson scored 2 points in his Turkish league debut for Besiktas Cola Turka in a 74-67 loss to the defending champion Fenerbahce Ulker in Ankara.
